frontmatter.title: Query with Comunica
frontmatter.description: Learn how to execute queries in different environments. Such as live in the browser, in JavaScript applications, or the CLI.

/blog/.title: Blog
/blog/.description: Blog posts, containing announcement or other of news.

/cite/.title: Cite
/cite/.description: Reference Comunica in a scientific publication.

/contribute/.title: Contribute
/contribute/.description: Contribute to the development of Comunica.

/docs/query/.title: Query with Comunica
/docs/query/.description: Learn how to execute queries in different environments. Such as live in the browser, in JavaScript applications, or the CLI.

/docs/query/getting_started/.title: Getting started with querying
/docs/query/getting_started/.description: Basic guides on how to easily get started with querying.

/docs/query/getting_started/query_cli/.title: Querying from the command line
/docs/query/getting_started/query_cli/.description: Execute SPARQL queries directly from the command line.

/docs/query/getting_started/query_cli_fi.title: Querying local files from the command line
/docs/query/getting_started/query_cli_fi.description: Execute SPARQL queries over local RDF files directly from the command line.

/docs/query/getting_started/query_app/.title: Querying in a JavaScript app
/docs/query/getting_started/query_app/.description: Execute SPARQL queries from within your application using the JavaScript API.

/docs/query/getting_started/query_browse.title: Querying in a JavaScript browser app
/docs/query/getting_started/query_browse.description: Execute SPARQL queries from within your client-side browser application using the JavaScript API.

/docs/query/getting_started/query_docker.title: Querying from a Docker container
/docs/query/getting_started/query_docker.description: Execute SPARQL queries within a Docker container.

/docs/query/getting_started/setup_endpoi.title: Setting up a SPARQL endpoint
/docs/query/getting_started/setup_endpoi.description: Allow querying over HTTP via the SPARQL protocol

/docs/query/getting_started/setup_web_cl.title: Setting up a Web client
/docs/query/getting_started/setup_web_cl.description: Set up a user-friendly static Web page where SPARQL queries can be executed client-side

/docs/query/getting_started/query_dev_ve.title: Query using the latest development version
/docs/query/getting_started/query_dev_ve.description: If you want to make use of the latest changes that are not released yet

/docs/query/usage/.title: Usage showcase
/docs/query/usage/.description: Examples of where Comunica is used.

/docs/query/faq/.title: Querying FAQ
/docs/query/faq/.description: Frequently asked questions about using Comunica.

/docs/query/advanced/.title: Advanced querying
/docs/query/advanced/.description: Advanced guides on how to get the most out of Comunica.

/docs/query/advanced/basic_auth/.title: HTTP Basic Authentication
/docs/query/advanced/basic_auth/.description: Send authenticated HTTP requests by including username and password.

/docs/query/advanced/caching/.title: Caching
/docs/query/advanced/caching/.description: When remote sources are requested, caching allows them to be reused in the future.

/docs/query/advanced/context/.title: Passing a context
/docs/query/advanced/context/.description: A context can be passed to a query engine to tweak its runtime settings.

/docs/query/advanced/federation/.title: Federated Querying
/docs/query/advanced/federation/.description: Query over the union of data within any number of sources

/docs/query/advanced/graphql_ld/.title: GraphQL-LD
/docs/query/advanced/graphql_ld/.description: Using the power of JSON-LD contexts, GraphQL queries can be executed by Comunica

/docs/query/advanced/hdt/.title: HDT
/docs/query/advanced/hdt/.description: HDT offers highly compressed immutable RDF storage.

/docs/query/advanced/logging/.title: Logging
/docs/query/advanced/logging/.description: Loggers can be set to different logging levels to inspect what Comunica is doing behind the scenes.

/docs/query/advanced/memento/.title: Memento
/docs/query/advanced/memento/.description: Using the Memento protocol, time travel queries can be executed.

/docs/query/advanced/proxying/.title: HTTP Proxy
/docs/query/advanced/proxying/.description: All HTTP requests can optionally go through a proxy.

/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs/.title: RDF/JS
/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs/.description: To achieve maximum interoperability between different JavaScript libraries, Comunica builds on top of the RDF/JS specifications.

/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs_querying/.title: Querying over RDF/JS sources
/docs/query/advanced/rdfjs_querying/.description: If the built-in source types are not sufficient, you can pass a custom JavaScript object implementing a specific interface.

/docs/query/advanced/result_formats/.title: Result formats
/docs/query/advanced/result_formats/.description: Query results can be serialized in different formats.

/docs/query/advanced/source_types/.title: Source types
/docs/query/advanced/source_types/.description: Comunica detects and handles different types of sources.

/docs/query/advanced/sparql_query_types/.title: SPARQL query types
/docs/query/advanced/sparql_query_types/.description: Different SPARQL query types are possible, such as SELECT, CONSTRUCT, ASK, ...

/docs/modify/.title: Modify Comunica
/docs/modify/.description: Learn how to configure your own Comunica engine, or extend Comunica by implementing new components.

/docs/modify/getting_started/.title: Getting started with modification
/docs/modify/getting_started/.description: Basic guides on how to easily get started with Comunica modification.

/docs/modify/getting_started/custom_conf.title: Creating a custom configuration
/docs/modify/getting_started/custom_conf.description: Create a custom configuration of Comunica modules with specific features.

/docs/modify/faq/.title: Modify FAQ
/docs/modify/faq/.description: Frequently asked question about Comunica modification.

/docs/modify/advanced/.title: Advanced modification
/docs/modify/advanced/.description: Advanced guides on how to get the most out of Comunica modification.

/docs/modify/advanced/browser_builds/.title: Browser builds
/docs/modify/advanced/browser_builds/.description: All modules in Comunica can be built for the browser
